## Introduction

Welcome to the R Consortium R Submissions Pilot 6 documentation portal. You will find key materials, discussion notes, and additional information related to this pilot. To learn more about the submissions working group, please visit [rconsortium.github.io/submissions-wg/](https://rconsortium.github.io/submissions-wg/).

## Objectives

The objectives of the R Consortium R Submission Pilot 6 Project are:

-   Use AI assistance to build out more ADaM and TLF programs for future submission pilots.
